docs.title: Bingo Game and Endless Bingo Game with Score Multipliers
docs.text: This project has two different apps: Bingo Game and Endless Bingo Game, both with score multipliers, which is based on how quickly each cell is marked.

docs.title: Bingo Game
docs.text:
• Score multiplier based on how quickly each cell is marked
  • Bingo score multiplier increases with each bingo
  • Endless bingo game with score multipliers

docs.title: Endless Bingo Game
docs.text:
• Time limit of 1, 2, 3, or 5 minutes
  • Score multiplier based on how quickly each cell is marked
  • Bingo score multiplier increases with each bingo

docs.title: Bingo Game with Score Multipliers
docs.text: This web app is a bingo game with score multipliers for making streaks and making bingos. It has various score multipliers, like making a bingo increases the score multiplier and get a lot of points, marking the cell quickly when the number is called will get bonus points and changing to higher difficulty will call numbers faster, but gets more points.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Various score multipliers
  • Three difficulty modes: Easy, Medium and Hard
  • Free space button to play the game with a free space marked at the center of the board

Try it at StackBlitz

docs.title: Endless Bingo Game with Score Multipliers
docs.text: This web app is an endless bingo game with score multipliers like making bingo will increase the score multiplier. This game has a time limit from 1 to 5 minutes in length. When a bingo is made, the bingo board will draw random numbers from a cleared line.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• 1, 2, 3, 5-minute time limit
  • Various score multipliers

Try it at StackBlitz
